title: Executive Order 6668-Veterans Regulation No. 1 (e)
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me under sections 1 and 4 of title I of the act entitled "An act to maintain the credit of the United States Government", approved March 20, 1933 (Public, No. 2, 73d Cong.), the following regulation amending Veterans Regulation No. 1 (d) is hereby prescribed:
1. Veterans Regulation No. 1 (d) is hereby canceled effective March 28, 1934.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6668-Veterans Regulation No. 1 (e) Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362433
